dedication.para: For Billie, you are my life!

preface.title: Forword
preface.para: I want to start this by recalling the how stupid I was to backup my documentation and notes. Two years ago, I used a blog to backup my data, it got messy while more and more articles is added, and it was basiclly impossible to do changes, since there is no revision control. later, I tried google doc for a while and it is nice. now I use github and I like it so much. But finally I decide only to keep the unstable stuff in github, and everything I consider is not to be changed much will be do as docbook files, such like project Tinylion.
